name: Amazon Sales Dataset
data_intro: This dataset is having the data of 1K+ Amazon Product's Ratings and Reviews as per their details listed on the official website of Amazon

cat_feature_intro.discounted_price: - discounted_price - Discounted Price of the Product
cat_feature_intro.actual_price: - actual_price - Actual Price of the Product
cat_feature_intro.discount_percentage: - discount_percentage - Percentage of Discount for the Product
cat_feature_intro.rating: - rating_count - Number of people who voted for the Amazon rating
cat_feature_intro.rating_count: - rating_count - Number of people who voted for the Amazon rating
cat_feature_intro.user_id: - user_id - ID of the user who wrote review for the Product
cat_feature_intro.user_name: - user_name - Name of the user who wrote review for the Product
cat_feature_intro.review_id: - review_id - ID of the user review
cat_feature_intro.img_link: - img_link - Image Link of the Product
cat_feature_intro.product_link: - product_link - Official Website Link of the Product
